text: “I believe that opening the economy the way he did it is causing a lot of the problems we have right now.” Dr. David De La Zerda, of Jackson Memorial Hospital in FL, says he disagrees with Gov. DeSantis stating that reopening businesses is not driving the spike in Covid-19 cases. https://t.co/Cutg5CaAkA

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: The Lead With Jake Tapper
entity.description: CNN's chief Washington correspondent, Jake Tapper, hosts this hourlong weekday afternoon program, which covers all the day's top stories from around the country and the world, headlines that span politics, money, sports and popular culture. "The Lead" works to ensure that viewers are caught up on the stories that matter, often highlighting news that may have been overlooked. Prior to joining CNN, Tapper served as senior White House correspondent at ABC News.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
